    • enableProjectActionsBts

      public void enableProjectActionsBts​(boolean isCompile, boolean isRun)
      Enables the buttons for actions to compile and run a project. The specified booleans each are true to enable, false to disable
      Parameters:
      isCompile - the boolean for compile actions
      isRun - the boolean for run actions

    • enableChangeProjBt

      public void enableChangeProjBt​(boolean b)
      Enables or disables the button for actions to change project
      Parameters:
      b - true to enable, false to disable

    • enableCutCopyBts

      public void enableCutCopyBts​(boolean b)
      Enables or diables the buttons for cutting and copying actions.
      Parameters:
      b - true to enable, false to disable

    • enableSaveBt

      public void enableSaveBt​(boolean b)
      Enables or disables the button for saving actions
      Parameters:
      b - true to enable, false to disable

    • enableUndoRedoBts

      public void enableUndoRedoBts​(boolean isUndo, boolean isRedo)
      Enables or disables the buttons for und/redo actions. The specified boolean each are true to enable, false to disable
      Parameters:
      isUndo - the boolean for undo actions
      isRedo - the boolean for redo actions
